The NHS loses 26,000 working hours to its staff attending 'woke' events as waiting lists soar to a record 7.4 million
09/07/23 09:03
Around 26,000 hours a year are wasted on events, often held during the working day, which bosses have failed to clamp down on, with 1,000 taking between between January 2022 and March this year. A Freedom of Information request by the Taxpayer's Alliance uggests at least 26,000 hours of staff time were taken up by the network events over this period, equivalent to one member of staff working for more than 13 years.
